item.title: Tower block chute blocked, 16th June
item.description:
Itâ€™s been three weeks of the chute being blocked, my mother who lives in Seaton Point E5 8PY and has disabilities, the smell an the weather is terrible, I noticed flies coming through, when is this likely to be fixed, I would appreciate Any updates on this
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Nolan Way, Hackney, London

item.title: Not enough bins, 16th June
item.description:
The bins are overflowing every day and the foxes/other aninimala are moving the litter. In the summer please provide more bins as this has to be cheaper /more environmentally friendly than having to manually clear this up every day.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kelsey Park Avenue, Beckenham, London
